cnbc.title: Amazon to announce largest layoffs in company history, source says
cnbc.summary: The layoffs will amount to the largest cuts to Amazon's corporate workforce in the company's history, according to a person familiar with the matter.

cnbc.summary: The AI200, expected in 2026, and the AI250, planned for 2027, both can come in a system that fills up a full, liquid-cooled server rack, Qualcomm said.

cnbc.title: South Korea's third-quarter GDP grows at fastest pace in over a year, beating expectations
cnbc.summary: According to advance estimates from Bank of Korea, GDP rose 1.7%, year on year, compared to the 1.5% expected by economists polled by Reuters.

cnbc.title: Tesla risks losing CEO Musk if $1 trillion pay package isn't approved, board chair says
cnbc.summary: Tesla Board Chair Robyn Denholm said Elon Musk is key to the future of the EV maker as it focuses more on Full Self Driving and Optimus.
